lead_paragraph: A mural painted by the pseudonymous British artist Banksy  has been taken off display at a nonprofit gallery in Detroit after the gallery said the work had been threatened with defacement or destruction, The Detroit Free Press reported.
snippet: A mural painted by the pseudonymous British artist Banksy  has been taken off display at a nonprofit gallery in Detroit after the gallery said the work had been threatened with defacement or destruction, The Detroit Free Press reported.

headline.main: Banksy Work Is Moved After Threats
headline.print_headline: Arts, Briefly: Banksy Work Is Moved After Threats
